reviewText:
This was a really good deal for 4 full-length movies, funny in a sometimes uncomfortable way
(say:dark). Someone enjoyed it so much they stole it before I had seen all the movies! So my
daughter bought it for me again. Still haven't seen them all.
I bought this for one movie and got four good ones.  A great bargain that will make you LOL.

"Serial Mom"is horribly terrific. "Nurse Betty" is the bomb. Great show. "Very Bad Things" is creepy and marvelous. BUT "Your Friends and Neighbors" is a total snoozefest; more like a very boring, slow and unwatchable soap opera. Why was it included on a "dark comedy" compiliation? It is neither dark nor a comedy in any sense. But the other three are great.
I have thoroughly enjoyed this movie pack! Four dvd's for the price of 1z or less! Can't beat this deal and all of the movies are top-rate and there aren't any scratches or defects. I'm very pleased!
Serial mom is one of the best movies I've seen in the comedy genre.
I LOVE IT
I love it and still watch it

I was only familiar with two of the movies in this collection, Very Bad Things and Nurse Betty.  It was great to see them again:yes dark, but not without humor.  The other two movies,Serial Mom and Your Friends and Neighbors were a welcome addition.  There was a whole new perspective of Ben Stiller.
I am totally ravishingly chique, Thanks.
Love it and Love it - nuff said
Funny movies

This is an excellent qaudruple feature for the price.  I honestly had just bought it specifically to get serial mom and very bad things in 1 convenient package.  The other 2 nurse betty and friends n neighbors i had never seen but thoroughly njoyed those as well.  Image and audio qaulity is great to.  It is 2 dvd's in all and you get 2 films each on a disc. Disc 1 has serial mom and nurse betty and other DVD contains the other 2 films.  You can't go wrong with this one,4 great films for 5 bucks is a real steal.
Humorous DVD set.

I love this DVD just for the movie Serial Mom. I hate to admit this but I have never even heard of the other three movies.  I can't wait to watch them, if they are anything like Serial Mom I will  probably like them also.
Great collection
I bought this just for "very bad things" and "serial mom", those alone are worth it! Great movies!
No  problems
Bosses collection 4 serial mom it is hands down one of the best comedies ever it is getting kind of dated but it still is fun
4 very good movies.
all is great
bought it for Serial Mom Movie. A Dark Comedy which tickles my funny bone.
Movie arrived very quick. Played perfect. I had been looking for this movie a long time.
awesome!!
All four movies are good I love nurse Betty and very bad things that is why I ordered the movie dark comedy

Bought this DVD for the hysterical movie Serial Mom and ended up really liking Very Bad Things as well.  It had a mix of serious story line with some very graphic murders which started out with an accidental killing.  I think it was even better than Serial Mom which has more comedic story line. Haven't seen the other two movies yet, but very pleased with DVD so far.  If you like comedy mixed with good story lines that are 'dark', and you like laughing one minute and then being horrified the next-this DVD is for you.
Hell of a deal just for Serial Mom! Bonus that it came with a couple more movies.
Awesome
We bought this just for Serial Mom because it was cheaper than buying it alone. Love that movie.
I really enjoyed the movies.
Terrible bunch of films. Do not waste your time and money..
Serial Mom & Very Bad Things were hilarious but seriously what valid complaint can  one make after getting four movies for less than $10 bucks.
Great! Fast shipping. No problems. Thanks!
Ordered this just for Serial Mom and excited to own the other movies.
Great!!!!! Everything was perfect.
Serial Mom is hilarious! Wrong...but funny! Ha!
I bought this for a Christmas present and she loved it!
I really wanted 3 of these movies, so this truly was the best purchase available.
on time great combo
Good
funny satire, goof ball stuff. on time
Serial mom!!! Love it!!

I saw this DVD in a bargain bin once. I bought it as a gift for a relative, but I was wishing there had been another one to buy for myself. So glad I found it on Amazon at a bargain price! Maybe I have a sick sense of humor, but I love dark comedies. Serial Mom by John Waters is one of my favorites. Kathleen Turner plays the Mom perfectly and hysterically. You may recognize the actors who play the kids, as well. Sam Waterston is the oh-so-naive husband of the serial Mom. A few cameos top this movie off, and you've got a gem. This DVD set also has Nurse Betty, another excellent movie. Renee Zellweger in her younger days, and she is wonderful. Very Bad Things is such a dark comedy that it's actually kind of disturbing, even to me. It really is about some very bad things. Still, it's a good movie. I haven't gotten around to watching the "Neighbors" movie on this DVD. If you like dark comedy, this is a great bargain DVD that is hard to find. The video and audio quality of the DVD are both excellent.
Like the movies . Got for a good deal

Serial Mom is the funniest movie ever made (since the Naked Gun series) and I'd already purchased this dvd online a while ago.  Recently wanted to watch it but couldn't find it anywhere (thought I'd lent it out to somebody).  So, I went online and bought it again.  Almost directly thereafter, I found the original dvd in question and, actually, it didn't bother me at all.  You really can't have too many copies of Serial Mom.
Serial Mom is my and always will be my all time favorite. Next is Nurse Betty. Other 2) flicks are okay...
There are four good movies here for an incredibly great price!!! I got more then my moneys worth with this set!!!
Serial Mom should have been a movie by its self, I don't even know what the other movies are about, I only purchased this for that one movie.

Only watched the first video.....corrupt in several places, pauses, pixelates
Delivery was very prompt! Will watch the other 3 soon but really ordered it for the Serial Mom film. Was disappointed in the quality.
I haven't even seen the three other movies on this DVD but Serial Mom is worth the price by itself. Very creative and funny and dark. Love it.
I ordered this for my mother in law who loves the movie serial mom. The other movies was pretty good also. The price was amazing.
Wanted to purchase Serial Mom -- a classic.  Had been looking for reasonably priced copy for some time.  Other movies were a bonus.  Can't beat the price!

I only ordered the four pack because I wanted the movie  three movies yet "Serial Mom" and this was all that they had available. I have not watched the other three movies yet, but "Serial Mom" is a hilarious classic! It is satire at its finest and Kathleen Turner is amazing i the title role. I definitely recommend this to anyone who appreciates satire and classic over the top humor.
Dvd and cover in good condition,some light scratches. Movies them selfs were not to my liking some people may like these type of movies but not me.
love it. great price for 4 hilarious dark comedies. very good deal. each film is older but i still deem classics.
Really just bought this movie because I love Serial Mom and wanted to own it. Now that I watch this movie as an adult its kind of corny, but somehow I still enjoy it.
I bought it just for Serial Mom but also love Very Bad Things. I haven't watched the other two movies but it worth it just for the two!
Great price.  Takes up less space in your collection also.  Makes it easy to have a movie marathon since you don't have to get up and changed the DVD to watch another.
Great variety pack of movies, love it. Purchased it for a gift. Arrived quickler than expected and was well packaged for protection.

Of all the value packs this is the best for content and packaging.  2 movies on each disc is a nice feature for this couch potato.

I had already seen everything but "Your Friends and Neighbors" but couldn't resist, knowing I would see the others again.  Serial Mom is a classic and very rewatchable.

I liked "Friends and Neighbors", which isn't as dark as the others - well, at least, it's not about murder, rather about marital affairs.
I bought this just for the movie Serial Mom which is one of my favorite movies from my childhood!!! That movie is aewsome and the rest of the movies that came with it were awesome as well!!!

I only purchased this because I wanted to own Serial Mom which is a great movie. And the price for the four movies was around the same price as buying Serial Mom alone. It was a grea purchase I enjoy the other movies also. The delivery was fast also.

All of the other 4 pack movie sets that I have purchased are either double sided disks, or 4 disk sets.  These are single sided disks - 2 movies per side.  This is not explained in the description.  Buyer beware.

a 4-pack awesome and a good deal i got this for serial mom only for those who love a funny movie with a sick twist watch this and it has a good cast not only that it starts off right away not slow and dragging watch it and get it

I really only brought this movie for serial mom because it was cheaper than buying it on its own. I already have very bad things which is funny has hell. Serial mom  is also funny, so if you don't have either of these movies I totally recommend this set,its worth the price just for those two movies alone. The other two sux...
It arrived on time and was exactly as described.
VERY  GOOD  PASS IT ON TO EVERY ONE  ALLEN
Really only got this for one movie.
